patterns: How do I borrow a book?
Are there quiet study areas in the library?
responses:
Our library is open on all working days, timing 9.10 AM to 6.00 PM.
To borrow a book, please visit the library desk with your student ID.

patterns: What sports teams do we have?
How can I join a sports team?
responses:
We have a variety of in-door and out-door sports teams including cricket, volleyball, Badminton, Tennis, Chess, etc.,
KCET is an active member of different sports associations.
You can contact the respective coaches once you joined the college.
We also offer intramural sports for students.

patterns: What student clubs and organizations are there?
How can I join a club?
Are there any special interest groups?
responses: We have a diverse range of student clubs and organizations, including NSS,NCC,YRC,Ramanujam club,Photography club, etc.,

patterns: How can I get help with my resume?
Are there job fairs on campus?
responses:
We offer a range of career services, including resume workshops and mock interviews.
Training Development and Placement Cell helps students to upskill their skills to meet the industrial expectations and thereby making them job ready once they graduate from the Institution.

patterns: How can I get help with my coursework?
Are there study groups for specific subjects?
responses:
Yes, we provide academic tutoring services if needed by the students.
You can contact your faculties on tutoring and course related research.

patterns: how many student studying in kcet
responses:
Our College was established in the year 1998.
Our College spans to 47.92 acres of land.
Total Students : 1950
Total Faculty : 143
Programmes : 14
Placement : 91%

A pass in the HSC (Academic: both +1 and +2) or its equivalent with a minimum average percentage in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry put together as given below.
General Category : 45%
Backward Class : 40%
MBC and DNC : 40%
SC/SCA/ST : 40%

-A library with an extensive collection of over 68,000 books.
-A state-of-the-art computing facility with 800 computers.
-Professional counseling services for student well-being.
-A dedicated health care center.
-Convenient transportation options, including buses.
On-campus banking and ATM services.
-Wi-Fi connectivity throughout the campus.
-Reliable Reverse Osmosis (RO) water facilities.
To Make this Institution the unique of its kind in the field of Research and Development activities in this part of world.
To impart highly innovative and technical knowledge to the urban and unreachable rural student folks through "Total Quality Education".
Committed to impart Quality Technical Education imbibed with proficiency, human values and continual improvement.
